channel.title: [508 Bulby] how do i make npcs say welcome to the server [508 Bulby]
channel.description:
Alright, i was just wondering how i would make NPC's Say welcome to the server, i got two guys already saying welcome to server i just want to know how to change it, im using a bulby 508 Scape, i know this might be an easy doing but im really new at this cut me some slack please still learning and doing pretty good thanks to all you ones willing to help me, Its great i think if everyone was willing to help like you Moparscape helpers on this topic page, then people could get really great just pointing out some things!! :)
Progress on the server:
Added Godwars Dungeon Fixed The gfx for specs Fixed teleport glitch ( Cant tele out of 20+ Wildy) Fixed Mining Added Tormented Teams, With the teleport command ( There at the normal place that there at on rs )
